title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: THE BEACH GIRLS AND THE MONSTER & SPIDER BABY

sources.title: SPIDERBABYBEACHGIRLSMONSTER
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD. Features a custom menu with either poster art or a still photo from one of the movies. Burning this DVD is beyond easy: Download the zipped folder, open it, and extract the VIDEO TS folder. Grab a blank disc and burn the VIDEO TS folder onto it. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This DVD features a double-bill of THE BEACH GIRLS AND THE MONSTER (A.K.A. MONSTER FROM THE SURF) & SPIDER BABY, with preview and intermission reels included. Enjoy the show!
